Detailed Description

Server side manipulation.

Author:

Class that provides server side routines. Accepting and manipulating connections

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gene::Server::BroadcastPolicy
Enumerator:
BroadcastAll 

Broadcast to all nodes.

BroadcastInclude 

Broadcast only to listed nodes.

BroadcastExlude 

Do not broadcast only to listed nodes.
